argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_prmnn | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. NN ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_nnred | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | #P_prmgt1 | |- ( P e. Prime -> 1 < P ) |
| 4 |  | #P_1mod | |- ( ( P e. RR /\ 1 < P ) -> ( 1 mod P ) = 1 ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( P e. RR /\ 1 < P ) -> 1 = ( 1 mod P ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 5 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( P e. Prime -> 1 = ( 1 mod P ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> 1 = ( 1 mod P ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A mod P ) = 1 <-> ( A mod P ) = ( 1 mod P ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> P e. NN ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> A e. ZZ ) |
| 11 |  | #P_1zzd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> 1 e. ZZ ) |
| 12 |  | #P_moddvds | |- ( ( P e. NN /\ A e. ZZ /\ 1 e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A mod P ) = ( 1 mod P ) <-> P || ( A - 1 ) ) ) |
| 13 | 9, 10, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A mod P ) = ( 1 mod P ) <-> P || ( A - 1 ) ) ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> ( ( A mod P ) = 1 <-> P || ( A - 1 ) ) ) |
